recipesJson.name: Strawtastic
recipesJson.author: JFMDEVELOPMENT
recipesJson.description:
Just maybe the best Strawberry Vape you have ever tried .......... It is one of a kind with lots of textures 

Recipe Pack Available at Bull City Flavors 
http://www.bullcityflavors.com/strawtastic-by-jfm-development-discounted-full-recipe/

Good off the shake
Best after 3 days
Fantastic after a week steep

reviews.text: Definitely a solid strawberry recipe but personally I'd leave the Super Sweet out- Just my .02. I think the percentages on the strawberries could all be toned down a little as well but thanks for putting this together :-)
